scripts._dist-umd: node ./admin/cmds/set-option cjs && rollup -c && mv ./packages/fisco/dist/fisco.umd.min.js ./packages/fisco/dist/fisco-all.umd.min.js && node ./admin/cmds/set-option cjs && rollup -c
scripts._dist-esm: node ./admin/cmds/set-option esm && rollup -c --configModule && mv ./packages/fisco/dist/fisco.esm.min.js ./packages/fisco/dist/fisco-all.esm.min.js && node ./admin/cmds/set-option esm && rollup -c --configModule
scripts._dist-wechat: node ./admin/cmds/set-option wechat && rollup -c --configWechat && mv ./packages/fisco/dist/fisco.wechat.min.js ./packages/fisco/dist/fisco-all.wechat.min.js && node ./admin/cmds/set-option wechat && rollup -c --configWechat
scripts._dist: npm run _dist-umd && npm run _dist-esm && npm run _dist-wechat
